thread.title: Kate Hudson moved by Adele’s new song
thread.title_full: Kate Hudson moved by Adele’s new song

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Kate Hudson moved by Adele’s new song
text:
Kate Hudson moved by Adele’s new song By Indo-Asian News Service on October 25, 2015 at 2:15 AM Comments 
Hollywood actress Kate Hudson ended up in tears after listening to singer Adele’s new song “Hello”. ”Hello”, which released on Friday, had a great impact on the actress. After giving it a listen, the 36-year-old shared a teary image of herself hugging a pillow, reports mirror.co.uk. 
“When @adele puts out a new single… She’s done it again!” Hudson captioned her photograph. Singer Katy Perry also admitted she ended up crying after hearing the British singer’s song, sharing an image of a wet pillow on Twitter. 
  25, 2015 2:22 AM Topics:
